name: Split (itch) (DomCripps)
description:
Move, Split, And Use The Shape Of The Board To Avoid Obstacles, Reach The Goal, And Solve A Series Of Puzzles In, Split!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys To Move
  • Spacebar or Left Mouse To Split
  • R To Restart
  • Q/E - Previous/Next Level
  • Escape To Go To The Menu

Objective

It's Simple! To Pass Each Level All Blue Coloured Tiles Must Be Covered By A Ball.
